snippet: Olli Rehn, the European commissioner for economic and monetary affairs, urged legislators to pass a law that would let him push countries even harder to shore up their finances.
abstract: Olli Rehn, European commissioner for economic and monetary affairs, defends bloc's austerity policies and urges legislators to pass law that would allow him to push countries even harder to shore up their finances.

byline.contributor: Melissa Eddy contributed reporting from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: Olli Rehn, the European commissioner for economic and monetary affairs, urged legislators to pass a law that would let him push countries even harder to shore up their finances.

headline.main: Official Urges Greater Accountability by Euro Members
headline.print_headline: Commissioner of the Euro Warns That Austerity Policies Must Continue
